casebody.data:
YOST v I FLEISCHER & SONS Decided June 11, 1934 Anthony B. Dunlap, Cincinnati, and Wm. Walker Johnson, Cincinnati, for plaintiff. Bert H. Long, Cincinnati, and Milton M. Bloom, Cincinnati, for defendant.

Ohio Appeals, 1st Dist, Hamilton Co

For full opinion see 2 OO 209; 49 Oh Ap 46.
